data.title: Champions Journal
data.meta_description: It has been a long and sometimes agonising path back to the Champions League for FerencvÃ¡ros, but the Hungarian giants with a storied past are beginning to put new roots down on the European scene

âWith Slavia Praha and Sparta Praha, other top clubs from leagues in the surrounding countries, weâre still below them in terms of salary budget, but the challenge is to get this level. We want to continue in this way and be competitive, not just with money but by making the right decisions and working hard and efficiently in every aspect.â The signs are certainly good.
